item.title: Model MaRS Rover
item.author: vkvidesh@umich.edu (Videsh VK)
item.description: Engineered a 3-legged rocker–bogie suspension Mars rover to compensate for off-center mass from a side-mounted 5-DOF manipulator.

item.title: TSA Driven Exoskeletal Glove
item.author: vkvidesh@umich.edu (Videsh VK)
item.description: Developed a lightweight hand rehabilitation exoskeleton for spasticity using twisted string actuation, achieving comparable functional capability at ~33% of the cost of commercial systems.

item.title: 5-DOF Pick and Place Manipulator
item.author: vkvidesh@umich.edu (Videsh VK)
item.description: Designed and fabricated a 5DOF pick and place manipulator for the Grid Competition hosted by Flipkart.

item.title: Cervical Collar for Comfort
item.author: vkvidesh@umich.edu (Videsh VK)
item.description: By prioritizing mobility alongside support, the optimized cervical collar was developed to improve patient comfort, aid rehabilitation, and promote independence in daily activities.

item.author: vkvidesh@umich.edu (Videsh VK)

item.author: vkvidesh@umich.edu (Videsh VK)
item.description: About Me

item.title: Internship at HyperHorizon PVT LTD
item.author: vkvidesh@umich.edu (Videsh VK)
item.description: Designed a full 6-DOF dynamic model for a fin-controlled autonomous underwater vehicle, enabling simulation-driven design and control development.

item.title: Microscale Transport Laboratory
item.author: vkvidesh@umich.edu (Videsh VK)
item.description: Uncovered spatial bifurcation and asymmetric flow behavior in acoustically driven inhomogeneous fluids, allowing the creation of advanced acoustofluidic design strategies for efficient particle sorting and droplet patterning.
